ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Program_Type__c , 'ELA') , OR( ISBLANK( Customer_Decision_Maker__c ) , ISBLANK( Customer_Decision_Maker_Title__c ) , ISBLANK( Final_Approver_in_Customer_Organization__c ) , ISBLANK( Final_Approver_Title__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Program Type is ELA, then the Customer Decision Maker, Customer Decision Maker Title, Final Approver In Customer Organization and Final Approver Title fields must be specified.
